label.excludedDevice: Device has been excluded from receiving print jobs from the Funnel

message.addDevices: Use the 'Add Devices' button at the top right of this page or use the button below to add devices to your organisation
message.devicesPageInfo: The status for all devices in your organisation are shown on this page
message.excludeDevice: {{device}} excluded from receiving funnel print jobs
message.warnRemoveDevice: You will no longer be able to monitor or send print jobs to this device from the Funnel.
message.warnRemoveDevice_name: You will no longer be able to monitor or send print jobs to {{device}} from the Funnel.
message.willExcludeDevice: Print Jobs will no longer be created for this machine when it is excluded

tooltips.devices: All the devices that have been added to your Funnel are shown in this tab.
tooltips.requiresAttention: This shows devices that have an error or have lost connection.
